dialog.name: Insert_Debug_to_Design
dialog.whatsthis: Imports the .rvl file into the design project. Importing the .rvl file is required to add the modules to the design.

dialog.name: Select_Signals_dialog
dialog.whatsthis: Displays the signals available for trigger units.
Displays the signals that you have selected to include in the trigger unit. You can select up to 256 signals.
Moves selected signals from the left pane to the right pane.
Moves selected signals from the right pane to the left pane.
Moves the selected signal up one line. The order of the signals affects how the comparison is performed.
Moves the selected signal down one line. The order of the signals affects how the comparison is performed.

dialog.name: Token_Manager
dialog.whatsthis:
Lists all the token sets in the Reveal project.
Name: Specifies the name of the token set.
Max Token Bits: Specifies the maximum bit size of the token value in the token set.
Adds a new token set to the list.

Defines the tokens in the selected token set. You can edit the names and values of tokens directly in the table cell.
Name: Specifies the name of the token. This is the label that will appear in the Waveform View tab of Reveal Analyzer.
Value: Specifies the bus value the token represents.
Opens a previously created token (.rvt) file, and adds the file's token sets into the Reveal project.
Saves the token sets into a separate token (.rvt) file. The .rvt file can be used in other Reveal projects.

dialog.name: Search_Result
dialog.whatsthis: Displays the signals that the search found. Select the signals you want to use.
